tool_description:
See the value of a Bitcoin according to different sources with a simple JSON API.
All major currencies are supported (USD, EUR, GBP, CAD, JPY, CNY etc.)
name: Bitcointy
title: Bitcointy

api_list.name: Get conversation rates for all sources
api_list.description: GET /all/:currency to get all the conversion rates in all sources for a currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/all/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/all/{currency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Convert a BTC amount to the desired currency
api_list.description: GET /convert/:amount/:currency to convert an amount of BTC to the desired currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/convert/10/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/convert/{amount}/{currency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get average price
api_list.description: GET /average/:currency to get an average price based on all the providers for a currency
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/average/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get chart data
api_list.description: GET /charts/:type to get the data that fills the charts in https://bitcointy.herokuapp.com/ (types are circulation, price and transactions)

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: types are circulation, price and transactions

api_list.name: Get conversation rates in source
api_list.description: GET /:ticker/:currency to get the conversion rates in a source (see next section for available providers) for a currency

required_parameters.name: ticker
required_parameters.description: BlockChain (blockchain) MtGox (mtgox) Bitcoin Charts (btccharts) Coinbase (coinbase) BitPay (bitpay)

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/coinbase/USD"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com/{ticker}/{currency}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-bitcointy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get currency conversion
api_list.description: GET /price/:currency to get the plain text conversion for a currency
